phrs.translation: 溶解, 液化, 溶化, 使液化
液化, 溶解, 溶化, 使液化

sentences.sentence: You can liquefy the carbon dioxide to separate it from the other constituents.
sentences.translation: 你可液化二氧化碳以使它与其他成分分离。

sentences.sentence: I take my gas phase composition out and I re-liquefy it.
sentences.translation: 把气相部分拿出来再液化。

sentences.sentence: Unfortunately, an earthquake might liquefy the core of the dam.
sentences.translation: 不幸地是，一次地震就可能将水坝的关键之处毁于一旦。
